Detailed Description

template<typename Point>
class pwspd< Point >

Implements a prallel well-seperated pair decomposition of a point set.

Parallel Well Seperated Pair Decomposition Class

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename Point>
pwspd< Point >::pwspd ( std::vector< Point > &  P,
double  S = 2 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Constructor

Parameters:
P vector of points for which the WSPD is to be constructed.
S seperation factor for the WSPD (boxes will be considered well separated if they have a minimum distance greater than S times the maximum corner to corner distance of the boxes)

Run

Parameters:
Wsp Vector of WSPs storing the output

sets the spread of the WSPD

Set Spread

Parameters:
S the spread factor Note, this will only effect the WSPD if set before the run command is issued
